name: Galactic Mac & Cheese
description: A swirling galaxy of creamy cheddar cheese entangled with perfectly cooked macaroni strands, crowned with a meteor shower of crispy breadcrumbs. A comforting classic from Earth, reimagined for the space traveler.

name: Margherita Pizza from Mars
description: A Martian twist on a classic, with fresh mozzarella clouds, tomato dust, and basil leaves, all resting on a thin, crispy crust. A slice of the Red Planet in every bite.

name: Caesar Salad Satellite
description: Romaine asteroids tossed in a cosmic Caesar dressing, topped with crouton comets and parmesan shards. A stellar choice for the light-hearted astronaut.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara Quasar
description: Al dente spaghetti strands caught in a creamy sauce black hole, made from egg yolk, pecorino cheese, pancetta stars, and a sprinkle of pepper from the cosmos.

name: Veggie Burger UFO
description: A mysterious juicy veggie patty from another world, served on a whole grain bun spaceship with lettuce, tomato, and a tangy alien sauce.

name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich Comet
description: Tender grilled chicken breast flying through space with avocado, bacon, lettuce, and honey mustard on a toasted bun, leaving a tasty trail.

name: Steak Frites Starship
description: Succulent steak cooked to your preference, served with crispy golden fries and herb butter, ready to take you on a culinary journey across the universe.

name: Sushi Roll Platter Nebula
description: An assortment of fresh sushi rolls including California, Spicy Tuna, and Eel Avocado, each roll a planet in the sushi solar system.

name: Chicken Curry Constellation
description: Tender pieces of chicken simmered in a rich and aromatic curry sauce galaxy, served with basmati rice stars.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl Galaxy
description: A hearty bowl filled with quinoa asteroids, roasted veggie planets, avocado moons, and a tahini dressing comet tail.

name: Seafood Paella Planet
description: A Spanish delicacy filled with saffron-infused rice stars, shrimp comets, mussel moons, and chorizo asteroids.

name: Pancake Stack Black Hole
description: Fluffy pancakes stacked high, drizzled with maple syrup and topped with fresh berries, a gravitational culinary force not to be missed.

name: Miso Ramen Meteor Shower
description: A warming bowl of ramen with miso broth, tender pork, soft-boiled egg, and green onions, each ingredient a meteor streaking through the night sky.

name: Beef Tacos Spacecraft
description: Three soft tortillas filled with seasoned beef, fresh salsa, cheese, and sour cream, ready to launch your taste buds on a mission of discovery.

name: Chocolate Brownie Supernova
description: A rich and fudgy brownie, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce, exploding with flavor.

name: Lobster Bisque Galaxy
description: A creamy soup made from lobster stock, aromatic vegetables, and a touch of brandy, a taste of the ocean's depth brought to space.

name: Mushroom Risotto Meteorite
description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with a medley of wild mushrooms and finished with parmesan, as rich and mysterious as a meteorite's journey.

name: Eggplant Parmesan UFO
description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella and parmesan cheeses, a dish that's out of this world.

name: Lemon Cheesecake Moon
description: A creamy cheesecake with a tangy lemon flavor, orbiting a crumbly biscuit base, reminiscent of the moon's surface. A celestial dessert that's out of this world.

name: Falafel Wrap Comet
description: Crispy falafels wrapped in a warm pita, with lettuce, tomatoes, and a tahini sauce, zooming through your taste buds like a comet through the cosmos.
